subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=う
|kanon=う
|kanyoon=おう
|kun=おうな-, あたた-める}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Originally /omi<small>1</small>na/. Likely realized as [omina] (see [[w:Jōdai Tokushu Kanazukai|Jōdai Tokushu Kanazukai]]). The initial /o/ expressed "grown, large" and contrasted with /wo/ "young, youth" found in [[女|womina]] "woman".

subSections.title: Noun
